items.sentence: She sat next to him wishing she were somewhere else.
You might want to call Tom and have him pick you up.
I plan to buy a new car as soon as I can afford one.
Tom can\'t help but be impressed by Mary\'s courage.
I think I\'ve already spoken to everyone about that.
I think Tom didn\'t understand what you were saying.
I think that you didn\'t watch the video to the end.
I still remember the first time I came to this city.
Aren\'t you the only one who has a key to this door?
Tom wants to know what time you\'ll be getting here.
I\'ve got to get used to doing this sooner or later.
I\'ve lived in Boston for a little over three years.
I\'ve never seen anything more beautiful in my life.
I\'ve never told anyone that my father is in prison.
Tom didn\'t know any of the details of Mary\'s plan.
You\'ll be missed by your friends when you\'re gone.
Tom bought a camera to give to Mary on her birthday.
Tom bought some books to read over the summer break.
What do people usually do in the summer around here?
What\'s obvious is that you\'re not very happy here.
